thread.title: Paul Hubbard - Peterborough
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Paul Hubbard - Peterborough

author: Paul Hubbard - Peterborough
title: Paul Hubbard - Peterborough
text: A very easy to use web site that offers great choice coupled with excellent value for money. Great communications throughout every part of the order, delivery even came with extra vertical slats. Very happy with my order & would not hesitate to recommend this company to all my friends. I will be using them again.
